Russell Westbrook

Russell Westbrook III ▪ Instagram: russwest44

(The Brodie, Russ, Beastbrook, Mr. Triple Double)

Position: Point Guard ▪ Shoots: Right

6-4, 200lb (193cm, 90kg)

Team: Denver Nuggets

Born: November 12, 1988 in Long Beach, California us

College: UCLA

High School: Leuzinger in Lawndale, California

Draft: Seattle SuperSonics, 1st round (4th pick, 4th overall), 2008 NBA Draft

NBA Debut: October 29, 2008

Experience: 16 years

  • 9x All Star
  • 2x Scoring Champ
  • 3x AST Champ
  • 9x All-NBA
  • 2008-09 All-Rookie
  • 2x AS MVP
  • 2016-17 MVP
  • NBA 75th Anniv. Team

Frequently Asked Questions

How old is Russell Westbrook?

Russell Westbrook is 36 years old.

Where was Russell Westbrook born?

Russell Westbrook was born in Long Beach, California.

When was Russell Westbrook born?

Russell Westbrook was born on November 12, 1988.

How tall is Russell Westbrook?

Russell Westbrook is 6-4 (193 cm) tall.

How much does Russell Westbrook weigh?

Russell Westbrook weighs 200 lbs (90 kg).

Is Russell Westbrook in the Hall of Fame?

Russell Westbrook is not in the Hall of Fame.

When was Russell Westbrook drafted?

Russell Westbrook was drafted by Seattle SuperSonics, 1st round (4th pick, 4th overall), 2008 NBA Draft.

What position does Russell Westbrook play?

Point Guard.

What is Russell Westbrook's net worth?

Russell Westbrook has made at least $342,603,650 playing professional basketball.

How much does Russell Westbrook make?

Russell Westbrook made $46,295,265 in 2023.

What does Russell Westbrook average?

Russell Westbrook averages 13.0 points, 5.1 rebounds, and 6.4 assists per game.

How many rings does Russell Westbrook have?

Russell Westbrook has won 0 championships.

What is Russell Westbrook's Twitter account?

Russell Westbrook is on Twitter at russwest44.

What is Russell Westbrook's Instagram account?

Russell Westbrook is on Instagram at russwest44.

What schools did Russell Westbrook attend?

Russell Westbrook attended Leuzinger in Lawndale, California and UCLA.

What are Russell Westbrook's nicknames?

The Brodie, Russ, Beastbrook, Mr. Triple Double are nicknames for Russell Westbrook.

Is Russell Westbrook injured?

Russell Westbrook is listed as Out (Hamstring) - Westbrook could return to the floor for the Nuggets after the NBA All-Star break, per head coach Michael Malone, as per Vinny Benedetto of The Denver Gazette.
